chapters.title: Prologue:  Embers Falling on Dry Grass
chapters.info:
Dragon Reborn,
      p. 34â€”According
      to the Karaethon Cycle, the Prophecies of the
      Dragon, the man who is the Rebirth of
      Lews Therin Telamon, the man known as the Dragon
      during the War of the Shadow.  Over the years, many men have claimed to
      be the Dragon Reborn, even men who could not channel.  The true Dragon
      has been Reborn in a young man named Rand al'Thor, a
      shepherd from Emond's Field.
      See also
      Ablar, Logain;
      al'Thor, Rand;
      Dragon, The;
      Taim, Mazrim.
